comments.author: surkov.alexander@gmail.com
comments.creator: surkov.alexander@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: DOM select event doesn't provide background information what was selected so we can't fire correct selection events. Notifications should be intergrated into nsTreeSelection and trigger a11y whenever selection is changed.
comments.text: DOM select event doesn't provide background information what was selected so we can't fire correct selection events. Notifications should be intergrated into nsTreeSelection and trigger a11y whenever selection is changed.
